LanguageData.SyrTraitsTraitCount: Amount of traits pawns spawn with
LanguageData.SyrTraitsTraitCountWarning: Warning: Only 5 traits can be displayed, enable "tiny trait font" to view up to 8
LanguageData.SyrTraitsTraitsTinyFontTooltip: This allows up to 8 traits to be displayed in the character window
LanguageData.SyrTraitsSexualityCommonalityBiTooltip: Gets calculated by subtracting straight and gay from 100%
LanguageData.SyrTraitsTraitsForcePassionTooltip: Causes profession related traits to grant at least minor passion in their improved skill and remove any passion in the skill they affect negatively.\n\nFor example: Green Thumb will give passion in Plants, but remove any passion in Mining.
LanguageData.SexualityPawnTooltip: Which genders this person is attracted to
LanguageData.RomanceFactorTooltip: How likely this person is to try to romance someone, on a scale from one to ten
LanguageData.PsychicFactorTooltip: This person's natural sensitivity to psychic phenomena
